{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3547893,"name":"Owen Busler","username":"Owen_Busler","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/owen_busler/{size}/7684_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-05T02:59:35.160Z","cooked":"

Howdy yall,

We are experiencing random connect/disconnects of our NavX V2 (2024 Jan 1 Board Rev). We updated all firmware (V34) and WPI/Studica library versions. We power the NavX through MXP and over USB.

We are running YAGSL and when we configure it to run over SPI we see the random 1-2 second disconnects. When we run over the (not recommended) usb connection, it is stable.

Any advice on how to run over SPI using YAGSL without having the random disconnects.
